Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutWindow
    The visualization of the about window that contains information about the project
    Grid
    Draws a grid on the map viewport to help visualizing and creating the 2D map with 2D Map Builder
    LayerView
    View class for layers panel that contains the existing currently existing layers of the map and lets user adjust opacity for each of them
    MainWindow
    The main window of the 2D Map Builder that will act like a hub for the tools of creating and visualizing the 2D map.
    MapPositionView
    View for the current mouse tile position on map displayed to help the user map positioning
    MenuBar
    The interface for the menubar and its components
    NewFileDialog
    The dialog panel for the new file feature Collects information for the creation of the new project
    NewTilesetDialog
    The dialog JPanel for the new tileset funcionality of adding tilesets to the program
    PreferencesDialog
    Dialog of preferences menu containing customizations that user can make
    ResizeDialog
    The dialog JPanel for the map boundaries resize functionality
    TilesetView
    Class that represents the view of the tileset panel in the main window
    ToolBar
    View class for the tool bar interface that contains quick access tools for user interactions
    ViewportMap
    Represents the 2D map visualization that the user will interact to create and design the maps, contained in the main window of the program 2D map builder Observer Pattern: Observers map data for changes that occur in it (map manipulation)
    ViewportTileset
    Represents the 2D map visualization of the tilesets that the user will use to aid the creation of the maps.
